overview: Serata Paperino is a special-movie produced in 1988 by Walt Disney Television Italy, directed and written by Aurelio Castelfranchi, Antonella Cond√≤ and Cecilia Valmarana. It was broadcasted for the first time on Rai 1 on 1988, Easter day, and was regularly re-proposed until 1996.
title: Serata Paperino
